visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes for better readability. The x-axis represents the months of the year, while the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series, named 'Temperature', contains the monthly average temperature values. The series uses a custom color, '#FF6347', for better visual distinction. Additional configurations include setting the chart's background color, margins, and enabling the legend with styled text. The tooltip is configured to use HTML for custom styling, with no background, border, or shadow to match the provided CSS styles.
